statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_name DESC, satisfaction_rating ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text ILIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, satisfaction_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, satisfaction_rating DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reports;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_reports WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profile ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_reports WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM feedback_reports WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_reports WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, feedback_text FROM customer_profile INNER JOIN feedback_reports ON customer_profile.customer_id = feedback_reports.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_score FROM customers WHERE feedback_score > 80;
SELECT SUM(feedback_score) FROM customers;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, trend_name, trend_value FROM customers c JOIN trends t ON c.customer_id = t.trend_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, feedback_score FROM customers WHERE feedback_score > 80 ORDER BY feedback_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, trend_name, trend_value FROM customers INNER JOIN trends ON customers.customer_id = trends.trend_id WHERE trend_value > 100 ORDER BY trend_value DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, trend_value FROM trends WHERE trend_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY trend_name ASC, trend_value ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers LEFT JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback.feedback_text IS NULL ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM feedback_ratings ORDER BY rating_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT tag_name FROM feedback_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_mapping.feedback_id, feedback_category.category_name FROM feedback_mapping JOIN feedback_category ON feedback_mapping.category_id = feedback_category.category_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, feedback_data.feedback_text, ratings.rating_score FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback_data ON customers.customer_id = feedback_data.customer_id INNER JOIN ratings ON feedback_data.feedback_id = ratings.feedback_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating_score) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_data INNER JOIN ratings ON feedback_data.feedback_id = ratings.feedback_id GROUP BY customer_id;
